page.title: 06Boars Hill - Food- A child
page.content:
For breakfast I enjoy fried egg on toast, fried potato and sausage, it is very filling. For lunch on a school day I have cheese sandwiches, an apple, a chocolate bar and a carton of fruit juice. On a holiday I would have baked beans on toast and cheese and crackers. For dinner I have a stew and a pie of some sort. I like to cook, we have cooking lessons at school, I like to make short-cake and other kinds of biscuits.
I like cereals of all kinds, particularly corn flakes, rice crispies and cocoa pops, sometimes I have bran flakes, my mum says fibre in my food is good for me. I like fruit of all kinds, my favourite is oranges.
